about_the_game:
Embark on an exhilarating journey with Pegglo, the spiky hero in this captivating Peggle-like game infused with roguelike elements. In Pegglo, every game is a unique adventure filled with exciting challenges and strategic choices.

Gameplay Highlights:
  • Roguelike Mechanics: Experience a dynamic progression through a series of increasingly challenging levels. Each playthrough offers a fresh and unpredictable adventure.
  • Critical Hit & Stats: Master the critical hit mechanic to subtly alter the trajectory of your ball, making those perfect shots even more satisfying.
  • Power-Ups and Modifiers: Between levels, choose from a variety of power-ups and modifiers that enhance your abilities, offering countless strategic options and replayability.
  • Charming Protagonist: Join Pegglo, the brave hedgehog, on his quest to conquer intricate puzzles and defeat cunning foes.
With its delightful graphics, engaging gameplay, and a host of innovative features, Pegglo offers a unique blend of strategy, skill, and luck. Are you ready to guide Pegglo to victory?
